arguments.query: SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_type='BASE TABLE' AND table_schema NOT IN ('information_schema','pg_catalog') ORDER BY (SELECT COALESCE(pg_total_relation_size(quote_ident(table_schema)||'.'||quote_ident(table_name)),0)) DESC LIMIT 1; -- then run: SELECT * FROM <schema>.<table>;
